mapper.select: SELECT CC.CNTSTID , CC.TTL , CC.THMBN_FILEID , CC.ATCH_FILEGRPID , CC.APLY_BGNG_DT , CC.APLY_END_DT , CC.PRSNTN_DT , CC.DPCN_PSBLTY_YN , CC.CLSF_CD , CC.GDNC , CC.TRMS , CC.CN , CC.MDFCN_DT , CC.MDFRID , CC.REG_DT , CC.RGTRID , CU.NM RGTR_NM , CU.ACNT RGTR_ACNT , (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(CC.APLY_BGNG_DT, '%Y%m%d') THEN '159101' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') > DATE_FORMAT(CC.APLY_END_DT, '%Y%m%d') THEN '159103' ELSE '159102' END) CNTST_STTS_CD FROM TB_CMM_CNTST CC INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER CU ON CU.USERID = CC.RGTRID WHERE CC.CNTSTID = #{cntstid}
